revision.text:
__NOTOC__
'''[[Classes:Actor|Actor]]'''
clearscope static double '''GetDefaultSpeed''' (class<Actor> ''type'')
==Usage== Retrieves the specified actor class's default speed.
===Parameters=== *''type'': the class name of the actor whose speed to get.
===Return value=== The function returns the class's {{c|{{Property|FastSpeed}}}} property if the current difficulty setting has ''[[Skill definition#FastMonsters|fast monsters]]'' enabled and said property is 0 or greater, otherwise it returns the {{c|{{Property|Speed}}}} property. In the case that the class is {{c|null}}, it returns 0, however.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:DECORATE]] [[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Actor static functions]]
